mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblboard (bno, title, content, writer, filename, filesize) VALUES((select nvl(max(bno)+1, 1) FROM tblboard), #{title} , #{content} ,#{writer}, #{filename}, #{filesize})
mapper.update: UPDATE tblboard SET title = #{title}, content= #{content}, writer = #{writer}, filename = #{filename} , filesize = #{filesize} WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(bno) FROM tblboard
WHERE bno > 0
